title: Translate document to English while preserving all formatting
description: Translating a Chinese document (RETAILMAX Digital Transformation Plan) to English while maintaining all formatting, tables, and structure

conversation.content: Translate document to English while preserving all formatting.
I'll help you translate a document to English while preserving all formatting. First, let me check if the Word plugin connection is established, then I'll proceed with the translation.

actions.title: Check Word Connection

conversation.content: Great! The Word plugin is connected. Now I need to capture the current document content to translate it. Let me first read the document to understand what needs to be translated.

actions.title: Read Document Content

conversation.content: I can see the document is in Chinese. Now I'll translate it to English while preserving all the formatting. Let me use the TodoWrite tool to plan this task.
Now I'll start translating the document section by section. Let me begin with the title and header:

actions.title: Translate Title and Header
actions.description: Translating document title and header information

conversation.content: Now let me translate the section headings and main content:

actions.title: Translate Section Headings
actions.description: Translating section headings and strategic objectives

conversation.content: Now let me translate the Budget and Timeline table:

actions.title: Translate Budget Table

conversation.content: Now let me translate the Key Milestones section:

actions.title: Translate Key Milestones

conversation.content: Now let me translate the Risk Mitigation table:

actions.title: Translate Risk Mitigation Table

conversation.content: Now let me translate the ROI and Success Metrics section:

actions.title: Translate ROI Section

conversation.content: Now let me translate the Technology & Infrastructure section:

actions.title: Translate Technology Section

conversation.content: Now let me translate the Team Structure table:

actions.title: Translate Team Structure Table

conversation.content: Finally, let me translate the Recommendation section:

actions.title: Translate Recommendation

conversation.content:
Perfect! I have successfully translated your document from Chinese to English while preserving all the formatting. Here's a summary of what was translated:

Translation Complete

The document has been fully translated with the following sections:

1. Title & Header: "RETAILMAX Digital Transformation Plan" with Executive Summary
2. Strategic Objectives and Value Proposition: Full translation of goals, investment, and ROI details
3. Budget and Timeline Table: All phases, timelines, budgets, and deliverables translated
4. Key Milestones: Six major milestones from January to August translated
5. Risk Mitigation Table: Risks, mitigations, and contingencies translated
6. ROI and Success Metrics: Returns and metrics box translated
7. Technology & Infrastructure: Tech stack details translated
8. Team Structure Table: Roles, counts, and focus areas translated
9. Recommendation: Final recommendation paragraph fully translated

All formatting has been preserved including:
- Table structures and styling
- Bullet points and lists
- Font styles and colors
- Section headings hierarchy
- Special formatting boxes (like the green ROI box)

The document is now fully in English and ready for use!
Now let me export the translated document for you:

actions.title: Export Document
actions.description: Exporting translated document as DOCX file
